description: Grown up power harnessed in a smaller package. These ski boots have a snug fit that's also comfortable thanks to Supercomfort JR liners. The buckles keep a sturdy footing, while flexible construction has just enough forgiveness to help developing skiers learn the ropes.Ratchet buckle at the cuff closes and tightens the boot.Second buckle tightens the lower shell.Supercomfort JR liners provide warmth and comfort.Forgiving flex provide just enough support to help with the learning process.Grip-Walk soles makes walking in boots easier.
name: Dalbello CX 2.0 GW Jr. Ski Boots - Children to Youths
